title: Chicken Fingers with Ranchitas Nacho Excitante
instructions: Step 1. Preheat the oven to 400º F (200º C).
Step 2. Cut the chicken breasts into ¾-inch strips.
Step 3. Place the Ranchitas in a bowl and crush them with a mortar or food processor.
Step 4. In another bowl, beat the egg with the milk.
Step 5. Dip each chicken strip in the egg mixture and then coat with the crushed Ranchitas.
Step 6. Place the strips on a baking tray and brush them lightly with vegetable oil.
Step 7. Bake for 15 to 17 minutes or until the chicken is fully cooked.
Step 8. Serve with lemon mayonnaise or your favorite dipping sauce.
description: Crispy chicken tenders with the unique flavor of Ranchitas Nacho Excitante. A delicious option for the whole family.
